name: One Night in Romania: OVERTIME
description:
Welcome to the first Freddy Fazbear Pizzeria in Romania!
You got a job at a pizzeria in Galati, what could go wrong?

Gameplay:
-Watch the cams
-Close the vents when needed
-Repair your computer to protect yourself from hackers
-Close the doors when needed
-Survive until 6 am

Can you survive one night in Romania?
Ion is back with his friends, Nebunul W. and Gerila.

Special thanks to the beta testers:
Dirtopi
Black Biosis
Dionis
「Stefan」
Only.Sebastian

Honorable mentions:
Leon, he likes Kizuna AI
